t: Amazon sellers can now automatically improve product listings with our new Gen AI tool

t: Amazon’s new 'Buy for Me' feature helps customers find and buy products from other brands’ sites
s: April 3, 2025 - New beta feature allows customers to use their Amazon Shopping app to complete purchases from other brand retailer websites if Amazon doesn’t sell the item directly.

t: Amazon launches Nova Premier, its most capable AI model yet | TechCrunch
s: May 1, 2025 - TechCrunch Brand Studio · Crunchboard · Contact Us · Image Credits:Frederic Lardinois/TechCrunch · AI · Kyle Wiggers · 5:30 PM PDT · April 30, 2025 · Amazon on Wednesday released what the company claims is the most capable AI model in its Nova family, Nova Premier.

t: Amazon makes it easier for developers and tech enthusiasts to explore Amazon Nova, its advanced Gen AI models
s: March 31, 2025 - Amazon Nova includes three models (Nova Micro, Lite, and Pro) that generate text from different modalities and are incredibly fast, capable and cost-effective, and two additional models for generating high-quality images (Nova Canvas) and videos (Nova Reel) from text and image input.

t: Introducing Alexa+, the next generation of Alexa
s: February 26, 2025 - Powered by generative AI, Alexa+ is your new personal AI assistant that gets things done—she’s smarter, more conversational, more capable, and free with Prime.

t: Amazon is working on a new 'reasoning' AI model that competes with OpenAI and Anthropic
s: March 4, 2025 - Amazon is building its own AI model that incorporates advanced "reasoning" capabilities, Business Insider has learned. The offering is tentatively scheduled to launch by June under the Nova brand, a group of generative AI models Amazon unveiled late last year, according to a person directly ...
